modName: Ebony Armor and Mail recolour for Female and Male
summary: Retex of the Ebony Armor/Mail in a more Neutral/Knight way. Just got tired of all those \"dark themes\".
descriptionHtml:
Cheers!

just got tired of all those dark themed armors so i decided to recolor the ebony armor, since its the most fancy one in my opinion. My first time recolouring any armor of a game, hope you like it.

recoloured armor and mail version for both genders

Installation:

just unrar the file and copy/paste it into

steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\textures

if you dont have the textures-folder, just make one.



greez
petrified
author: Petrified88
